flavor: It was weeks before you noticed the world was ending.
effect: Add +1 to every resource roll. When you are not in a community, roll twice and keep the higher result.

flavor: Folks seem nice enough, but you're not taking any chances.
effect: You keep your resources when you join a community, and you may continue to roll for individual resources while in a community.

flavor: Seems luck is in short supply at the end of the world for everyone but you.
effect: You may reroll all 0s and 1s on resource rolls. You must keep the result of the reroll.

flavor: People need leaders like they need food. Sometimes more.
effect: Communities that form with you as a member do so for no cost. You may join a community at any time, and you cannot be voted out of a community.

flavor: You've got the stomach for doing what needs done.
effect: Community resource rolls get +3. You may take up to half of a community's resources when you leave for any reason.

flavor: Everyone's helpless eventually. You're just the first to admit it.
effect: Any community you join counts as +1 member larger for all purposes.

flavor: It's not about trust. It's about survival.
effect: Any community you join counts as -1 member for upkeep cost purposes only (minimum 1 member). While you aren't in a community, you cannot have less than 1 resource.

flavor: Not a second wasted on anything unnecessary.
effect: Individual and Community traits cost -2 resources (minimum 1). While you aren't in a community, you always gather resources, even if an event card would prevent you from doing so.

flavor: Thank god you spent all that time reading Wikipedia articles.
effect: At the start of your turn, select any available trait. On subsequent turns, at the start of your turn, you may exchange this trait for another available trait.

flavor: You're a small pebble, trying to redirect the raging river of the future.
effect: At any time, you may discard this trait to cancel any event card. If you are alone, gain 3 resources. If you are in a community, gain a new trait other than Seer.
